Package com.islandpower.configurator.model.project

Class Site

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.model.project.Site
public class Site extends Object
Represents the geographical details of a site. This class includes information about the site's coordinates, temperature ranges, panel orientation, and monthly solar irradiance and temperature data.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Site.MonthlyData
    Represents the solar irradiance and ambient temperature data for a specific month.
